quote_last:
,” answered the midwife.
“And what if I really am dying?” thought Olga Mihalovna, looking at her husband’s head and the window-panes on which the rain was beating.
title: The Party
author: Anton Pavlovich Chekhov

quote_last: , there was a rapping sound outside my door. I checked out the peephole. Ramirez stood outside, dressed in a big red basketball-type tank top, black shorts, and flip-flops.
title: White Night
author: Jim Butcher
